name: John Sharpe
note:
Product:  Recruit, Train, Manage,  Sales Agency, Fund Raising, Telesales, Event Sales Teams, Field Sales/Marketing Teams,
Target Audience:  B2C, D2D.
Immediate Requirement: HR-Sales Manager  (advanced English). They're getting too many new job applications, so it needs to be HR-Sales manager. To go through the applications, doing a quick zoom call with applicants and placing successful applicants into the diaries of the managers.
Next Step:  interview with candidates and also we will send additional information about our company.
Next Contact Date:  We will decide it via mail.

name: Roman Malashkin
note:
оновлено
Hey Nadia how are you?
Yes great thank you for the reminder
So I was wondering if you have any one that is dealing with product listing on woocommerce?
Currently, I have a client that needs this solution.
it's an existing website that needs product uploading.
It's on woocommerce (wordpress platform)
And of course, let me introduce myself - my name is Roman and I have a digital marketing agency that is specialized in the E-commerce industry (currently in Israel).
Right now we are hiring clients so with the growing demand, our openings will increase as well for PPC, Social & Design.

Company Name : Quality Media

Company Website :  https://q-media.co.il/

Contact Person : Roman Malashkin

Specialties: Marketing Services

Country-Location   Israel 

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: Roman plans to broad his business, so he needs some assistance. They are interested in hiring lead generation managers and PPC. Video editors could also be interesting. He has a client who needs to make updates on their website (https://ambil.co.il/).  Roman needs a virtual assistance for that who has experience in Woocommerse and product listing. He would like to start with part-time employment, and if everything is great to switch to a full-time position.

Next Step: send all information, CVs

Next Contact Day: Monday, 12:00 

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Sveta (Ruzaliya)

name: Bertie Clayton
note:
Invited with a partner
Company Name: Jane Clayton & Company

Website: https://www.janeclayton.co.uk/

Country - England

Contact Person: Bertie Clayton 

Product: Jane Clayton & Company is one of the most well-respected names in the world of fabric, wallpaper and made to measure furnishings. Their range of fabric, wallpaper and made to measure pieces now features over a hundred brands and caters to a variety of tastes and budgets, from coveted high-end designers to emerging independents and popular household names. With dozens of new collections added each week, there’s always something new and unexpected to discover.

Immediate Requirement: Database manager (to build the database of products in Excel), very attentive to details.

Next Step: Send SA, presentation. We are going to have an interview. The client will write me day and time later this week.

RESULT
We interviewed candidates for Jane Clayton & Company.

Maria https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/maria-k/
Lead Generation Manager. Worked as a teacher (english teacher)

Yana https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/yana-c/
LG manager. Have experience working with documents. Photography is her hobby. 

Yeva https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/yeva-k/
Worked in sales marketing, customer service. Also she worked as a photographer.

Elena https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/elena-p/
Worked as a hotel manager in reception, worked with financial documents. LG manager. 

Evelina https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/evelina-p/
LG manager. 

They need to think about all of the candidates. When they made a decision they came back to us by email.

name: Andrej Keckes
note:
Requirements: We are looking for Lead generation and cold email outreach for SaaS Startup. We need to do internet research, do lead generation including email list building, create and send series of email flows. Focus is to get lead on the phone to get feedback on our solution, setup appointment to demo or start free trial of our booking software for yoga, dance, fitness and sport facilities.We need help to write and optimize our email templates for opens and getting leads interestedI need to finetune first email template for first outreach + 3 or 4 email templates for follow ups.I need advice also on when to follow, with which subject line, etc....

Result
Client from Upwork
The call took place on Google Meet
Сompany Name: Sportimea
Company website: www.sportimea.com
Contact Person: Andrej Keckes
Product: Sportimea provides a complete solution and professional advice to make our business successful and our life easier. They help all sizes of companies, from trainers to enterprise.
Sportimea seamlessly integrates various facilities into a global booking platform enabling people to discover and book activities like yoga, pilates, dance, swim, massage, tennis or kids classes from one place. 
Immediate Requirement: He needs a Lead Generator Manager. He wants to start with 1 month and if it will work he is ready for long term cooperation. 
Next Step: send CVs of the most suitable candidates and all necessary information. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email.
